issue.title: Export for aggregated data not working correctly
issue.body:
**Original author :** Larsen de Martino Jorgen

When exporting aggregated data an hour to much is exported.

Fx. I have a SLA from 8:00 - 16:00 -  in all 8 hours.
I choose this SLA and choose to see report for 14 days.
I Export the data to CSV and I get 9 hours of results instead of 8 hours.

Issue has been fixed by Thomas Bergstedt
This ticket is just to document the bug and the fix and to be able to refer to the bug when commiting the change to the export function

All the best
Jorgen de Martino

Hope to see you all soon

**Fixed versions :** 4.0.0
